rules.description: Change space to left shift if held and space pressed alone
left_shift + esc to evavluate normal keyboard "~" for HHKB|使用 Shift + Esc 输入 ~
Left ctrl + hjkl to arrow keys Vim
Emulate AppCode double shift to Search History in iTerm2|iTerm 中双击右 Shift 发送 Ctrl + r 进行搜索历史, 配合 peco 使用更佳.
Simulate CMD+` use CMD+Esc for HHKB|使用 Command + Esc 模拟 Command + `, MacOS 的窗口切换热键
CAPS LOCK + hjkl to arrow keys
